metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15861 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Net-SNMP through 5.7.3 allows Escalation of Privileges because of UNIX symbolic link (symlink) following.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsnmp-base - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.5
libsnmp-perl - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.5
libsnmp30 - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.5
python-netsnmp - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.5
snmp - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.5
snmpd - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.5
snmptrapd - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.5
tkmib - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: net-snmp package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.5').
